title: The Flockas That Pray Together Stay Together
itunes:title: The Flockas That Pray Together Stay Together
description:
FRI 7/22 - THE FLOCKAS (Waka Flocka & Tammy Rivera) stopped by The Breakfast Club to talk about their breakup to makeup. Then Pastor John Gray from the Fox show "The Preachers" sits down with Envy, Angela & Charlamagne to talk about new-age ministry and reaching people of all kinds.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
